definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. severe floods and fierce beasts (idiom)/fig. great scourges/extremely dangerous or threatening things

sentences.english: Characteristic of 060714 rainfall and floodwater is unfrequent in many rainfall and floodwater of the Helan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 其特性在贺兰山暴雨洪水中是历次上少见的。

sentences.english: The National Weather Service had predicted that the river would crest to about 19 feet above flood stage.
sentences.chinese: 国家气象台曾预报红河将上涨到洪水位以上19英尺。

sentences.english: The downstream current was swift after the flood.
sentences.chinese: 洪水之后下游的水流很急。

sentences.english: Nearly 3 weeks of continuous heavy rains and floods in eastern Australia, calamity-ridden.
sentences.chinese: 连续近3周的暴雨和洪水使澳大利亚东部灾难深重。

sentences.english: Rain-triggered flood submerges parts of Dazhou.
sentences.chinese: 四川达州遭暴雨袭击，洪水漫城。

sentences.english: Flooding forced the closure of manufacturing plants in Ayutthaya, according to news reports.
sentences.chinese: 据新闻报道，洪水已迫使大城府的制造工厂关闭。

sentences.english: Floodwaters are still rising after this week's heavy downpours across parts of Ohio .
sentences.chinese: 俄亥俄州部分地区本周连降暴雨，洪水仍在不断上涨。

sentences.english: Text 1And yet the myth of controlling the waters persists.
sentences.chinese: 但是，控制洪水的神话还在流传着。

sentences.english: The flood forecasting division gives authorities 24-hour warning of monsoon flooding.
sentences.chinese: 洪水预报部门为当局提供了24小时季风洪水预警。

sentences.english: The flood forecasting division gives authorities 24-hour warning of monsoon flooding.
sentences.chinese: 洪水预报部门为当局提供了24小时季风洪水预警。

sentences.english: A person that does not get online, often inspect a network to be great scourges .
sentences.chinese: 一个从来不上网的人，常常视网络为洪水猛兽。

sentences.english: So far eight people have died from flooding in Michigan and Indiana.
sentences.chinese: 至今密歇根州和印第安纳州已有八人因洪水丧生。

sentences.english: The solider delivered the boy from the flood.
sentences.chinese: 士兵把小男孩从洪水中解救了出来。

sentences.english: A glof happens when a glacial lake is created by a melting glacier and it then bursts.
sentences.chinese: 融化的冰川形成冰川湖，随后溃决，就会爆发洪水。

sentences.english: Hundreds were flooded out when the canal burst its bank.
sentences.chinese: 洪水冲破河堤，成千上万的人们背井离乡。

definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its dike/(of dikes) to collapse
(of a watercourse) to breach its banks/(of a dam) to burst
